=====================

THIS INFORMATION IS PROVIDED FOR CONVENIENCE ONLY. AMAZON DOES NOT PROMISE THAT THE EXTERNAL DEPENDENCIES AND THEIR APPLICABLE TERMS ARE COMPLETE, ACCURATE, OR UP-TO-DATE, AND AMAZON WILL HAVE NO LIABILITY FOR ANY OMISSIONS OR INACCURACIES. YOU SHOULD CONSULT THE DOWNLOAD SITES FOR THE EXTERNAL DEPENDENCIES FOR THE MOST COMPLETE AND UP-TO-DATE LICENSING INFORMATION.

YOUR USE OF THE EXTERNAL DEPENDENCIES IS AT YOUR SOLE RISK.
